Params.Param: SELECT AL2.ID, AL2.FinalSubject SUBJECT, AL2.Created CREATED, ALS.caption as MAXSTATE, (CASE WHEN BACK=0 AND ALDEF.NOTETYPE <> 0 THEN '#FF0000' ELSE '' END) as Color FROM ( SELECT id, FinalSubject, created, Max(state) MState, MAX(FORME) FORME, COUNT(BACK) BACK, alDefinition FROM ( SELECT AL.ID, AL.FinalSubject as FinalSubject, ALS.ID as State, AL.Created as Created, (CASE WHEN ALD.ADDRESSINCHANNEL='{CurrentIdentityId}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FORME, ANOTE.ID BACK, AL.ALARMDEFINITIONFK as alDefinition FROM BSE_AlarmLog AL LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogDelivery ALD ON ALD.alarmlogfk = AL.id LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogState ALS ON ALS.id = ALD.alarmlogstatefk LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmChannel ALC ON ALC.id = ALS.alarmchannelfk LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogNote ANOTE ON AL.id = ANOTE.ALARMLOGFK WHERE ALC.KEY = 'Window' ) X GROUP BY id, FinalSubject, created, alDefinition ) AL2 LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogState ALS ON AL2.MState = ALS.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_ALARMDEFINITION ALDEF ON AL2.alDefinition = ALDEF.ID WHERE FORME=1 ORDER BY CREATED DESC Exp;string CurrentIdentityId=CurrentIdentity.IdentityId.ToString()
